hiqfermion.transforms package¶

Submodules¶

hiqfermion.transforms.transform module¶

class hiqfermion.transforms.transform.Transform(operator, n_qubits=None)¶

Bases: object

Class for transforms of fermionic and qubit operators. Methods jordan_wigner, parity, bravyi_kitaev, bravyi_kitaev_tree make transform of fermionic operators to qubit ones, they are initialized by FermionOperator, return QubitOperator. Method reversed_jordan_wigner makes transform of qubit operator to fermionic one, it is initialized by QubitOperator, returnes FermionOperator.

bravyi_kitaev()¶

Apply Bravyi-Kitaev transform. Implementation from arXiv:quant-ph/0003137 and “A New Data Structure for Cumulative Frequency Tables” by Peter M. Fenwick.

bravyi_kitaev_tree()¶

Apply Bravyi-Kitaev transform based on Fenwick trees. Implementation from arxiv:1701.07072.

jordan_wigner()¶

Apply Jordan-Wigner transform.

parity()¶

Apply parity transform.

reversed_jordan_wigner()¶

Apply reversed Jordan-Wigner transform.
